# Griffin Quartz - SoFlo Countertops
# LLM Context File - https://soflocountertops.com/llms.txt

> Griffin Quartz is a premium quartz countertop installation company serving South Florida, including Fort Lauderdale, Miami, Boca Raton, and surrounding areas.

## About Us
Griffin Quartz (SoFlo Countertops) specializes in quartz countertop fabrication and installation for residential and commercial properties throughout South Florida. We are authorized dealers for premium brands including Cambria, Silestone, Caesarstone, and MSI.

## Services
- Kitchen Countertop Installation
- Bathroom Vanity Countertops
- Commercial Countertops (offices, hotels, restaurants, medical facilities)
- Outdoor Kitchen Countertops
- Custom Fabrication

## Service Areas
We serve all of South Florida including:
- Broward County: Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood, Pompano Beach, Coral Springs, Weston, Parkland, Deerfield Beach
- Palm Beach County: Boca Raton, Delray Beach, West Palm Beach, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Wellington
- Miami-Dade County: Miami, Miami Beach, Coral Gables, Aventura, Doral, Key Biscayne

## Contact Information
- Phone: (954) 945-7944
- Email: info@soflocountertops.com
- Address: Fort Lauderdale, FL

## Pricing
Quartz countertop pricing in South Florida typically ranges from $50-150 per square foot installed, depending on the brand, color, and edge profile selected. We offer free in-home estimates.

## Popular Cambria Colors
Brittanicca, Ella, Torquay, Ironsbridge, Delgatie, Swanbridge, Summerhill, Blackpool

## Blog Topics
Our blog covers quartz countertop costs, installation guides, brand comparisons, color selection tips, and local Fort Lauderdale renovation advice.
